mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM PINFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NORDERINFO(N_NAME, N_NUMBER, N_EMAIL, N_ADDR, N_REQUEST) VALUES(#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4}, #{param5})
mapper.select: SELECT MNAME,MADDR_ONE,MADDR_TWO,MADDR_THREE,MADDR_FOUR,MPHONE FROM MEMBERS WHERE MID=#{MID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
